testcase.classname: SC1- User could register with valid data
testcase.name: SC1- User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user clicked on register link...........................................passed When user selected gender...................................................passed And user entered first name.................................................passed And user entered last name..................................................passed And user selected birth of date.............................................passed And user entered email for registration.....................................passed And user entered company name...............................................passed And user entered password for registration..................................passed And user confirmed password for registration................................passed And user clicked on register button.........................................passed Then user should have a success message for registration....................passed

testcase.classname: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user clicked on login link..............................................passed And user entered email for login............................................passed And user entered password for login.........................................passed And user clicked on login button............................................passed Then user should have a success message for login...........................passed

testcase.classname: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user clicked on login link..............................................passed And user clicked on forgot password.........................................passed And user entered email for reset password...................................passed And user clicked on recover button..........................................passed Then user should have a success message for recover.........................passed

testcase.classname: SC4- Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: SC4- Logged User could search for any product

testcase.classname: SC5- Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: SC5- Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro

testcase.name: SC6- Logged user could select different Categories
